description: Good client for Tutanota. I prefer it over the web version.

Was my go to app for email communications on Linux, Windows and Android, but just recently stopped working on UBUNTU 22.04 LTS. I think after a minor upate to the OS . Keeps saying I don't have an internet connection.

Will update my review when it gets fixed.

IT works as advertised. 
Really love Tutanota!
Initial impressions are good. We'll see how it goes from here.
I had been using the app image up until now. Working on Fedora with Gnome Desktop. Thanks for making the flatpak available
no regular updates.
i cant open the app because is not run last version
summary: Greap app but no regualr update

this is the most incredible email service. but this client version doesnt work.

PLEASE FIX TUTANOTA
this version of the client isnt supported as of the client isnt supported.

After installing it and clicking the icon to run the app it just says "Something went wrong during the update process. We´ll try again later." So it won´t work on my PureOS version of Linux. :( I love you anyway, Tutanota!

description: This package includes an old version of the app that is no longer compatible with the Tutanota service so it's useless.
This is a great app. Unfortunately, the Flatpak that is available here is old and even does not start anymore (as it is too old)
summary: old version - really a pity - does not start

description: I can't even launch it. It showed a white blank window.
Client Outdated : Cannot Login
So old version so it does not work!
To old making it useless.

The service is great! The problem is this Flatpak is not well maintained.

Download the AppImage from the site. Hope they fix the Flatpak soon.

The app from Flathub isn't very well maintained and as a result is outdated and unusable at the time of this review.

My best recommendation is to download the desktop client from here instead: https://tutanota.com/blog/posts/desktop-clients/
summary: Tutanota is a great email service, however..

description: If you're tired of Google reading your emails and want to encrypt everything then this service is for you! They offer encrypted emails, contacts, and calendar. Though the Appimage has worked great for me the developers are making the flatpak the official image of this app. I do hope for improvements and better stability.
Ignore all the reviews complaining about it being outdated.
summary: Great app, its up to date

description: Tutanota is a secure and pro-privacy email service, with a free and open-source client available on GitHub. The functionality is great, and it contains no ads.
Normally the web app works fine for me, but when I want to make sure to get calendar notifications it's nice to have the app.
The Tutanota app was recently updated and I'm hopeful that Tutanota is able to maintain it more regularly. It works well and I prefer using it as a separate application.

This is the best email service if you value your privacy and need secure and private email. 

This version runs very glitchy on my Fedora 33 systems. 

This should be running smooth according to the review, not sure whats going on...

Download the appimage and it works great from tutanota website...stick to that

Love Tutanota, so this is not against them, rather the maintainers at flathub
summary: great app but not from flathub

description: Working well on several Fedora 33 machines and multiple android devices. Tutanota has been serving me well for 3 years now.

After the Tutanota team announced it, I have been using the app now and then (still prefer the web version) but it servers it purpose, be a OS client for people that want it that way. I may switch to the app after a while but I have just gotten used to it in Firefox, so it may take a while, still, thank you dev team for making it work!
This app used to be broken for quite a while, but looks like it's working pretty well now. Thanks to the Tutanota devs!
Best email ever. Clean design. Easy to use.
summary: Best email ever. Clean design. Easy to use

description: Been using for a year now as my primary email client on all my devices. It is privacy focused so there are compromises but nothing that effects my use 99% of the time, for instance no .ics option for the calendars you can only view within the app. Also no password reset, so be very careful with storing your login and recovery details. New features are rolling out too. Also gives me a lot more peace of mind using a service like this. Happy to recommend.

not working cause out of date
frozen in 3.50.10

I've been using tutanota as my main email client for a few months. Love the focus on privacy and transparency--although you have to be prepared to make a few, minor compromises. The app works fine and is frequently updated, and I have it installed on my Android phone, too. Keep up the good work!
Initially, I was pleased with Tutanota, until I discovered the user has to pay extra to enable each one. I did sign on for a paid version, but found it gained nearly nothing. Disappointing

I am a Tutanota fan but not this app. It has multiple issues. For example, the app will put itself in the top menu bar but you can't do much with it. App sucked so much I deleted it after only 1 day use. I am going back to their online portal.
so old it bugs oug when you launch jt

The app looks great in dark mode and I like that the client is open source unlike Protonmail. Having some issues getting the Flatpak connected to the internet at the moment, but this app exists in the package manager as well while that wrinkle is ironed out.
If you get it from flathub, you get the latest version
When I click to save the password, it does not. It logs me out by itself
summary: It keeps logging me out of my account

description:
So since short time the app requires me to fully login again as it says the keyring was invalidated.
Means. Email+PW+2FA everytime.

Besides all that it is almost the only app that starts offscreen for me (Manjaro KDE). I move to the browser instead...
Basically as stated. Using the browser version is more convenient...
I need to login after I closed the window, but app run and I see it icon in tray... But I don't open the app from tray icon, its start new app... Maybe you need to use PIN?
Title. Does not remember password so daily driving is almost not possible. Works well for what it is intended to do.
summary: Great app works well but does not store password

description: Works like a charm, as always. Never ever had problems. Tip: Instead of [9009le, m1cr0$0ft, w4@t$@pp & other likewise sheepleware], just use Tutanota, VZ-Linux, Threema & other Wolfware, if care about your online security. If not, then keep sleeping. Good night!
CURRENT VERSION IS OUTDATED AND NO LONGER SUPPORTED...
Leider ist die Version völlig veraltet und daher nicht nutzbar.
Leitet seinen Dienst - simply good

Die Bedienbarkeit ist eventuell auf den großen kommerziellen Anbietern etwas besser.
Für mich war es wichtig einen synchronisierten Kalender zu bekommen, der nicht von den großen kommerziellen Servern mitgelesen wird und andererseits wollte ich abgeschirmte Kontakte auf dem Smartphone haben. beides habe ich anderswo nicht gefunden. Verschlüsselte Email gibt es auch anderswo, aber das nehme ich gerne mit.

Un proveedor de correo electrónico que respeta tu privacidad. La versión de pago es totalmente accesible (en especial para economías del "tercer mundo"). Si bien el cliente está hecho en Electron, el consumo de recursos no es excesivo.
summary: Funciona muy bien. Buen servicio de correo

description: Fait chier, pas mise à jour !
Excellente mais non mise à jour...

REFONCTIONNE ENFIN !!!
Merci de l'avoir mit a jour.
Récemment mis à jour et fonctionnel sans problèmes. Utilisez Tutanota !

Première tentative de lancement de l'application après installation via gnome-software 3.30 avec l'extension flatpak :
Aucun résultat après l'entrée du mot de passe administrateur.
Seconde tentative :
Une fenêtre totalement blanche "Tutanota-desktop" s'ouvre sans qu'on 
puisse y faire quoi ce soit.
C'est vraiment dommage.
Bon courage pour trouver un correctif.
L'appli s'installe sans souci sur Arcolinux alors que plus difficile à installer sur ubuntu ou fedora (privilégier dans ce cas le terminal avec tutos).

Tested on:
Unbuntu 21.04 (works perfectly)
Debian Bullseye (start with an error message but no impact on use)
Parfait, email chiffré, sécurisé.
Не работает. Устарело

судя по обзорам годичной давности, приложение не обновляется. следовательно, можно и не устанавливать.
Это не почтовый клиент

С 14 февраля 2020 года сервис заблокирован на территории РФ по требованию Генпрокуратуры
В конце 2020 года Немецкий суд заставил почтового провайдера Tutanota установить бэкдор.
